title: Unknown DirectXError
body: I've been getting this directX error for a while, it shows up once the game actually starts to load after champ select. Any solutions? My AMD drivers and DirectX drivers are updated to the most recent version.

replies.body: Since you've already checked for driver updates, make sure that your firewalls or antivirus aren't blocking those files from being loaded properly. You can find those steps with some other useful ones in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3).

Snap you went through *all* of those steps in that guide in under 4 min, that's some kind of record. If those steps haven't helped at all feel free to reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with some of your network logs to see what's going on. Be forewarned, they will likely take you through those steps if it seems connection related so it might be good to go through those steps a bit slower one more time to be sure they don't help!
